Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Non-specific lipid-transfer protein D, cotyledon-specific isoform (NS-LTP D; Plants)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the plant LTP family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Plant non-specific lipid-transfer proteins transfer phospholipids as well as galactolipids across membranes. May play a role in wax or cutin deposition in the cell walls of expanding epidermal cells and certain secretory tissues.

Literature.Title: The lipid-transfer protein C of Ricinus communis L. isolation of two cDNA sequences which are strongly and exclusively expressed in cotyledons after germination.
Literature.Author: Weig A, Komor E.
